directions: Pour chopped nuts into a bowl, and set aside.  Spread each bread slice with approximately 1 tablespoon goat cheese. Dip into the pecans to thoroughly coat the cheese.  Arrange on a plate, and push a grape half into the top of  the cheese on each slice.
ingredients: 1 French baguette, cut into 1/2 inch slices
title: Nutty Goat Cheese Bites
